title: Start Of Something New
lyrics: - Living in my own world, didn't understand That anything can happen when you take a chance I never believed in what I couldn't see I never opened my heart(ohh) to other possibilities I know that something has changed Never felt this way, and right here - tonight This could be the start of something new It feels so right to be here with - you And now looking in your eyes, I feel in my heart The start of something new (ohh yeah) Now who'd of ever thought that We'd both be here tonight(ohh, yeah) And the world looks so much brighter With you by my side (by my side) I never knew that it could happen 'Til it happened to me I didn't know it before But now it's easy to see It's a start of something new It feels so right to be here with you And now looking in your eyes, I feel in my heart That it's the start of something new It feels so right to be here with you(ohhhh) And now looking in your eyes, I feel in my heart The start of something new the start of something new The start of something new
